ygData.subject: Re: Split personality
ygData.msgSnippet: Triceradon and Ultracon are still standing guard outside the Ark. They see Firearm carrying Spears approaching. Do you need any help? Triceradon askes.

Triceradon and Ultracon are still standing guard outside the Ark. They see 
Firearm carrying Spears approaching.
"Do you need any help?" Triceradon askes.
nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
>
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream arrived at Destructor's base. ï¿½He unbuckled Dark Mouse, 
> ejected her into the air, went to bot mode and caught her on the way 
> down. He walke dinto the base and found KitKat.
> 
> "Hey KitKat. We found this bot talking with Inferno. I captured it, 
> but I've got to go back and help Drillbit fight Inferno. You do what 
> you want with....hey, what's the matter? You seem upset?"
> 
> ______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> The Trainers arrived so that thye could see the CF, but could not be 
> picked up on scans. They were cloaked, but that only worked for sight 
> unless you had stealth cloak. Prebon pulled out the Tamer and checked 
> the scan for Spears.
> 
> "Damn it! They must have taken her inside. We're too late. She's in 
> stasis. But perhaps their is a way to still get ahead in this. I can 
> send messages and extra energy through the link that I have 
> established between myself and the chips. It could help the Trainer 
> program win permanantly. The Maximal chip would still be there, and 
> would work again with repair, but without repair it would just be 
> dormant. She would attack all those around her, and with the 
> distraction we could storm this new ship of theirs. And if that 
> doesn't work, the moment they remove the Trainer chip, if the can 
> find a way to do it without killing her, I simply give the self 
> destruct order and boom! We're down a few Maximals. I'll try the 
> first plan first."
> 
> Prbon began communicating with the Trainer chip.
> 
> *Come on Spears! You can win this! Come back to me! Defeat the 
> Maximals!*
> 
> Prebon kept repeating this message while sending small boosts of 
> energy to the chip.
> 
>
